title: Dead Island 2 Devs Open New Studio, Release "Mammoth" Game
text:
Dead Island 2 Devs Open New Studio, Release "Mammoth" Game 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
Three former Yager developers have left the Spec Ops: The Line and Dead Island 2 studio to create their own independent outfit, which they a... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
